content: MT-ES-40 OC Splice clevis Splice connector for coupling MT strut channels end-to-end (MT-40, 50, 60, 40D) ### Categories: Home > Products > Modular support systems > System connectors and interfaces- - - ### FEATURES:Features Part of the Hilti MT system – an economical, all-in-one solution for virtually all modular MEP support structures Easy to install – compatible with the Hilti MT Twist-Lock, a faster alternative to spring nuts for assembling a modular support system Adaptable – unlike welding, angle brackets allow you to modify strut channel framing during installation and for future MEP requirements Extensive software support – PROFIS Modular Support Engineering, the MEP Support Selector, Revit® families, and plug-ins for Staad Pro® and Smart 3D® are all available to streamline design and ordering Corrosion resistance – hot-dip galvanized to help protect against moisture and chemical corrosion Applications Extending MT strut channels by fastening them together end-to-end Assembling metal framing for MEP support structures when longer spans or increased floor/ceiling clearance are required Suitable for use in moderately corrosive environments ### TECHNICAL DATA: Material composition: Q235 or better steel Surface finish: Hot-dip galvanized - for outdoor use Material thickness: 4 mm Technical Data | Material composition | Q235 or better steel | Surface finish | Hot-dip galvanized - for outdoor use | Material thickness | 4 mm | Weight | 1.8 lb | Environmental conditions | Outdoor, low to moderate pollution (C3 / C4 - low) ### ITEMS- 2272063 - Splice connector MT-ES-40 OC - Package Size 12 pc
